entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Sanirajak
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 30 km/h becoming east 20 late this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 40 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 40 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41 with temperature rising to minus 36 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 41 with temperature rising to minus 36 by morning. Wind chill minus 52 in the evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
